Analysis Structure: Calculators

Calculator entry points for structure analysis.

This subpackage exposes the concrete calculator implementations used by the structure analysis services, currently including RMSD and (future) RMSF calculators.

Module contents

  • RMSD Calculator
  • RMSF Calculator
